result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel Carl Sanda was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
9:57 AM Defendant Daniel Carl Sanda in court.  Attorney Ellen Denise Craker in court for Daniel Carl Sanda.  Attorney Chad C La Lor in court for State of Wisconsin. 
State- plea to both counts. On Ct 1 60 days jail. Ct 2 30 days jail concurrent. Fine of $100 plus costs
Court notes plea questionnaire states " Battery"
Att Craker- that was an error
Defendant pleads no contest to counts 1 and 2
Court questions defendant, finds pleas are voluntary, judgment entered on both counts.  
Att Craker- 4 days sentence credit
Court- On Ct 1 60 days jail. Ct 2 30 days jail concurrent. 4 days credit. Start 06/15/22 at 6:00 pm.  Fine of $100 plus costs. Pay as per pay plan.

9:22 AM Defendant Daniel Carl Sanda in court.  Attorney Ellen Denise Craker appeared by phone for Daniel Carl Sanda.  Attorney Chad C La Lor in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case. Attorney asks for one more status. Court sets date.
Status conference scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Status conference on May 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:02 AM Defendant Daniel Carl Sanda in court.  Attorney Ellen Denise Craker in court for Daniel Carl Sanda.  Attorney Chad C La Lor in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case.  Craker indicates received offer, has not discussed with client. Asks for status.
Status conference scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.addlTxt: No contact with victim 1 or their address,   No use or possession of alcohol, one time personal property retrieval with the assistance of law enforcement, update address with the Clerk of Courts within 24 hours upon release from the jail.

03:08 PM Defendant Daniel Carl Sanda in court with attorney Ellen Denise Craker.  Defendant Daniel Carl Sanda in custody.  Chad C La Lor appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Daniel Carl Sanda appeared by video means with Attorney. Atty Craker inquires if there is an alternative address. Defendant doesn't know the address.   Attorney/defendant acknowledges receipt of criminal complaint, waives reading.  States request on bail: $750 signature bond with conditions of no use or possession of alcohol, no contact with victim 1 or their address. State gives prior criminal history dating as far back as 2009. 
Atty Craker has no objections to the signature bond. defendant has no missed Court hearings on Signature Bonds. Atty Craker is requesting no violent or abusive contact. Atty Craker also asks for a one time retrieval of personal property with the use of Law enforcement. 
Court Orders  $750 signature bond wtih conditions of No contact with victim 1 or their address,   No use or possession of alcohol, one time personal property retrieval with the assistance of law enforcement, update address within 24 hours of release from jail.  Status conference scheduled for April 4, 2022 at 09:00 am.
